import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios"; function Signup() { const [Data, setData] = useState({}) const handlechange = (e) => { setData({ ...Data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const handlesubmit = () => { axios.post("https://hotelbookingapp-api.herokuapp.com/api/auth/register",'Data').t } return (

) } export default Signup
